<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King. A proclamation concerning the adjournment of Hillary term. England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
3 sheets (versos blank).
printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty, London : 1665 [i.e. 1666]
At end of text: Given at Our Court at Oxford the 12th day of January, 1665. in the Seventeenth Year of Our Reign. Years are given according to Lady Day dating. Arms 66; Steele notation: of their 2) Courts 3) therein, if. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
